summary:
Gen-chan is Neiro’s new friend - Gen-chan is Neiro’s new friend ​which he recently met at the ​park! Having been of the same ​breed the connection between ​Neiro and Gen-chan was electric!

 Following Neiro’s newest ​adventure - Following Neiro’s newest ​adventure which was documented ​on Kabosumama’s blog it was seen ​that Neiro had met a new friend of ​the same breed, The name was ​Gen-chan! Make sure to read more ​in Kabosumama’s latest blog:

  - 

 How to buy - Create a wallet on metamask
Securely buy Ethereum (Can be purchased directly off metamask)
Connect to uniswap.io and paste the $GEN CA
Swap your Ethereum for $GEN
